title: Adaptive Pinching Antenna Optimization via Meta-Learning for Physical-Layer Security in Dynamic Wireless Networks
summary: This paper develops a gradient-based meta-learning framework for real-time control of waveguided pinching-antenna systems under user-location uncertainty and physical-layer security (PLS) constraints. A probabilistic system model is introduced to capture the impact of imperfect localization on outage performance and secrecy.
